entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain mixed with freezing rain late in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023
